sentences.en: As fist comes up, rotate of the torso into the punch.
sentences.cn: 如拳头发生, 进入打洞器之内躯干替换.

sentences.en: Bare your torso and stand in front of a mirror.
Corset: Article of clothing worn to shape or constrict the torso.
sentences.cn: 紧身健美装: 一种贴身内衣或外部装饰,使体形美观或紧束身躯用的衣物.

sentences.en: He took off his shirt to reveal his tanned torso.
sentences.cn: 他脱下了衬衫展现出晒得黝黑的身体.

sentences.en: He was dripping with sweat, his vest sticking to his torso.
sentences.cn: 他汗流如注, 背心全贴在身上了.

sentences.en: His knuckles showed white with the effort when he eased his powerful torso into the chair.
sentences.cn: 当他那强健有力的身躯坐在椅子上的时候,他的手指关节都因为用力的关系而呈现出白色了.

sentences.en: In this way the torso oscillates almost imperceptibly with the breath.
sentences.cn: 通过这种方式.躯干随着呼吸不知不觉地振动.

sentences.en: It was his darling Eve poking him rather vigorously about the torso.
sentences.cn: 他亲爱的夏娃正用力地戳着他的身体.

sentences.en: Kicking involves the torso as well as the legs and feet.
sentences.cn: 踢腿包括躯干,腿和脚的动作.

sentences.en: The base of his trunk as thick as a man's torso.
sentences.cn: 象鼻的基部象人体的躯干一样厚.

sentences.en: The glass bottle is the shape of a woman's torso.
sentences.cn: 玻璃杯呈女子身体的形状。

sentences.en: The headless torso of a man was found in some bushes.
sentences.cn: 在灌木丛中发现了一具无头男尸.

sentences.en: Turn the torso from upright the direction the left thigh.
sentences.cn: 行.上身由中正转为向左大腿方向前倾.

sentences.en: While a lower navel means a longer torso a better swimmer.
sentences.cn: 反之,肚脐位置低,躯干长,游泳就快.

words.tran_cn: 躯干；裸体躯干雕像；未完成的作品；残缺不全的东西

trans.tran_cn: （人体的）躯干，躯干雕塑像，未完成的作品，残缺不全的东西
trans.tran_en: your body, not including your head, arms, or legs
